Welcome! Welcome! What can Neehi do you for?

I need some Griffonskin Parchment. I heard you might have some.

Ahhh... yes yes! Neehi have new stock. Freshly plucked. Dealing with Giants?

Griffonskin is strong - lasts forever. Giants like like. That will be 100 Gold.
